summary: changes the normal shield bash animation to look like the bow bash animation (punching) best used with bucklers that have spikes at the edge of the shield
descriptionHtml:
Added new Targe Buckler mesh(optional) with blades sticking out the front

changes the normal shield bash animation to look like the bow bash animation (punching) best used with bucklers that have spikes at the edge of the shield

check out the video by bongfuhrer showin this animation in action.
     (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fVAdkDeEROQ&list=UUtw9jXvwYpHWAqI4H-MKSdw&index=1&feature=plcp  )

Fair warning. only works in 3d person view. 1st person shows normal bash animation, and if using large -to medium large bucklers, it may clip with the arm (severity depending on size of buckler)
i have not peonally tested this with regular shields. but should work fine... 

also check out this mod which gave me the idea for the changed animation

Uruk-Hai Shield By: mandarinn
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3454
author: blackrose86
